resources.string: \t Welcome to the shoe store Onboarding Page !

\t This is the welcome page for the shoe store inventory app ! we hope you will enjoy your journey in our store.\n \n You will find below a button to go to the instructions page to have some helpful tips in your journey :)
\t Welcome to the shoe store Instructions page!

The app consists of just 5 views for simplicity, you have alreay seen the login and welcome views, and this is the instruction view, the other 2 are the shoe list and shoe detail views 
 
 The shoe list view contains a list of all the shoes we have and for the shoe detail view, you can use it to add a new shoe 
 
 You can reach the shoe list view using the navigation button below ,and for the shoe detail page you can reach by clicking the pink "+" button you will see in the shoe list view 
 
 Hope you will have a nice time :)
